Summary: Bouncing and color changing light seen for over an hour.
divs: sighting details the light is north to north east from front porch. was on porch talking when this was noticed. this event is currently happening and report is being generated by my brother online. so far the event has had a duration of at least an hour. the color changes in intensity and angle is not high in the sky (couple inches from top of trees). the item appears to change shapes and appears to have a haze when it "flattens out". at arms length it would only take something the size of pencil point to cover. also appears as if it sometimes swings like a pendulum from about 4 to 8 o���clock. appears that another object similar in nature has approached and circled above and below the first object. can planes\helicopters have enough fuel for this duration of hovering? note: no noise other than crickets is observed. my sister and her husband are attempting to get a closer look at this time. she will report anything unusual in a separate report.
